is a city in the Gedo region of

. The town is the seat of Gedo region's most southern district or county. It border the regions of Lower and Middle Jubba as well as Bay and disputed region of northeast Kenya North East Province, formerly (Northern Ftontier District or (NFD).

Bardera is the most populated city in Gedo Region. The town is divided by the Jubba River into eastern and western sections.
